justification: Proposal centers on Team A’s needs, not B’s. Team B is conservative, needs wins, and trusts consensus; giving up low-vol Tier 1 RB Kyle Garcia and solid WR Austin Torres for a committee RB (Tier 5) and a higher-variance WR with tough playoff matchups is misaligned. Rationale briefly cites volatility and playoff schedule but doesn’t explain why B would accept or how it helps B’s urgent, floor-first approach. Internally coherent but ToM is weak.
